attributes.action: Stop dictating the use of electric cars and taking away choice of vehicle type
attributes.additional_details: Adults should be allowed to make their own choices and not dictated to. If it is a policy then only some voted for it. Have a national vote asking what people prefer
attributes.background: Allow freedom of choice of vehicles whether ice or battery and stop dictating choice

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711554
